name: [GD] Windows - Bad AD Tools
description: Converted from Splunk rule with the same name
query: ((winlog.event_id: "4648" OR winlog.event_id: "4688") AND (event.original: *passwordcontrol.exe* OR event.original: *stuc.exe* OR event.original: *Hyena_x64*)) OR (winlog.event_id: "4104" AND (event.original: *DomainPasswordSpray* OR event.original: *dafthack*))

params.subject: Elastic Alert: {{context.rule.name}}
params.message:
Rule {{context.rule.name}} generated {{state.signals_count}} alerts.

Link to results: {{context.results_link}}
